sentences.en: “Peopleask us how he would have felt now that we have a black President, and we knowhe would have been ecstatic, ” Emily said.
sentences.cn: “人们问我们如果父亲在世会怎样评价我们有一位黑人总统，我们知道他一定会欣喜若狂。” 艾米丽说。

sentences.en: an ecstatic welcome from the thousands who lined the streets
sentences.cn: 数千人狂热的夹道欢迎

sentences.en: And then an ecstatic scream of joy; and then , alas !
sentences.cn: 接着是一声欣喜若狂的尖叫，哎呀！

sentences.en: And then an ecstatic scream of joy; and then, alas!
sentences.cn: 紧接着是欣喜若狂的尖叫, 哎呀!

sentences.en: Annie was ecstatic about the idea.
sentences.cn: 安妮为这个主意欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: As the woman makes plans of a future with the perfect mate, her emotions are ecstatic.
sentences.cn: 当一个女人和自己最好的伴侣计划未来时，她的激情就会欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: Cool it, Steve, and tell me why you're so ecstatic.
sentences.cn: 冷静, 史蒂夫, 告诉我你为什么如此兴奋.

sentences.en: Eddie is ecstatic over his new train set.
sentences.cn: 埃迪对他的新玩具火车着了迷.

sentences.en: Her mood of ecstatic fidelity was a dangerous exaltation.
sentences.cn: 她苦行主义的忠实气质是一种危险的升华.

sentences.en: I am just ecstatic about going to visit you soon.
sentences.cn: 马上要见你,我开心去世了.

sentences.en: I see that I have lapsed into parable and ecstatic declamation.
sentences.cn: 我知道我在比喻和狂喜的辩论中造成了遗误.

sentences.en: In his then state of ecstatic agony such a conquest would have cost him little.
sentences.cn: 在他当时痛苦恍惚的状态里,这样一次胜利不会要他付出多大代价.

sentences.en: People were ecstatic at the host team's victory the match.
sentences.cn: 人们对主队的胜利欣喜若狂.

sentences.en: Sally was ecstatic about her new job.
sentences.cn: 萨莉对她的新工作高兴得发狂。

sentences.en: She was absolutely ecstatic when I told her the news.
sentences.cn: 当我把这个消息告诉她时,她兴奋极了.

sentences.en: The mazes of the dance were ecstatic.
sentences.cn: 跳舞那种错综曲折,叫人快乐得如登九天.

sentences.en: The production received ecstatic reviews and had audiences weeping.
sentences.cn: 那部上演的戏备受好评，让观众潸然泪下。

sentences.en: They were greeted by the cheers of an ecstatic crowd.
sentences.cn: 狂喜的人群欢呼着迎接他们。

sentences.en: Yet they died like anything but poets, died in mess ecstatic outbursts.
sentences.cn: 但是他们那种殉身的方式完全不象诗人,他们就会如醉如痴, 一哄而起.
